sub_title: International experienced program manager organising Darkness Into Light movement 2023 Amsterdam may 6th
summary:
Qualifications

I am a consulting project manager and coach with over 25 years’ experience in IT/ TI, logistic, financial and operational projects. I worked in many international oriented branches including telecom, internet, international lotery, logistics, M&A and management consulting. I have led multi-functional, multi-cultural and geographically diverse teams up to 100 fte.
A people person, who achieves objectives through skilled interpersonal communications, conscientious planning, proactive risk management, motivational team dynamics and network of business and technical contacts. My roles have ranged from being the program manager who drives the change, through to being a trusted consultant to Board members, helping them to get value from their projects, programs and ventures. 

See accomplishment section for detailed description of all projects that I worked on.

Capabilities & Skills

- Project management: Agile, Prince 2
- Consultant service design thinking: Customer journey, User experience, Requirements
- Project readiness assessments, project recovery
- Project auditing, evaluation
- Risk management
- Project governance
- Security & Privacy 
- People coaching, Team building, Training
- Business process redesign and improvement
- IT software development, Implementation, Migration
- Vendor selection, Vendor management
- Stakeholder management
- Worked in Warsaw, Vienna, Dublin, London, Zurich, Bucharest, Prague, Munich, Edinburgh

projects.title: KPN - Volte program - Projectmanager
projects.description:
Voice over LTE (VoLTE) provides a new communication capability to 4G mobile devices. With VoLTE, 4G devices can place or receive high quality voice and video calls with low call setup latency compared to traditional mobile access. In order for KPN to position itself well in the Dutch market, a project is initiated by KPN Netco FO and MO to deliver the VoLTE capability to their client base.

Responsible for the commercial launch of VoLTE for KPN retail customers, TI, member of the program team, Volte devices, processes, pilot, requirements gathering, project communication, stakeholder management.

authors.headline: International experienced program manager organising Darkness Into Light movement 2023 Amsterdam may 6th

profile_positions.description:
Op 6 Mei 2023 gaan wereldwijd honderdduizenden wandelaars voor zonsopgang de deur uit, om letterlijk van het donker naar het licht te lopen. Ook in Nederland. Het doel is om iedereen bewust te maken van een goede geestelijke gezondheid en van zelfmoord preventie. Daarnaast zamelen we geld in voor Stichting 113 Zelfmoordpreventie!

Samen wandelen voor mentale gezondheid
Darkness Into Light begon in 2009 in Ierland, waar 400 mensen samen wandelden om fondsen op te halen voor Pieta, de nationale beweging tegen zelfdoding. Inmiddels doen er wereldwijd 250.000 mensen mee.  In Nederland gaan de opbrengsten naar Stichting 113 zelfmoordpreventie!

Samen wandelen voor mentale gezondheid
Darkness Into Light begon in 2009 in Ierland, waar 400 mensen samen wandelden om fondsen op te halen voor Pieta, de nationale beweging tegen zelfdoding. Inmiddels doen er wereldwijd 250.000 mensen mee. Darkness into Light Nederland sloot zich, dankzij de Ierse gemeenschap in Amsterdam, in 2019 aan.  Dat jaar bracht de wandeling zes miljoen euro op, waarvan meer dan 20.000 euro in Nederland. In totaal is er de afgelopen jaren zo’n 29 miljoen euro opgehaald waarmee kosteloze acute psychische hulp wordt geboden.

Met Darkness Into Light willen we iedereen laten weten dat het oké is open te zijn over je mentale reis. We hebben allemaal wel iets, en het is oké om niet oké te zijn. We zijn overtuigd dat we door dit soort evenementen het stigma van geestelijke gezondheid kunnen doorbreken en mensen inspireren die het moeilijk hebben, kunnen steunen.

volunteer_experiences.description: I was trainer/ coach for 4 years. Managed footbal camps for three years. Helped teh club with setting up there "Respect" guidelines.
Helping people in my direct environment who are disabled or confused in a way that they cannot look after themselves.
As a boardmember of Darkness Into Light I organise the walk in Amsterdam and am trying to raise further awareness around Darkness Into Light and mental health challenges.
